title: Number Plate Detection
description: Developed an advanced computer vision algorithm for accurate, efficient license plate detection, benefiting traffic enforcement, tolling, surveillance, and parking systems.

title: Facial Emotion Recognition using GAN
description: Trained models to classify emotions from facial expressions, using GANs to generate diverse images, enhancing accuracy and recognizing emotions.

title: Flight Booking System
description: The Flight Booking System simplifies flight bookings for travelers and streamlines administrative tasks, providing efficiency for all stakeholders.
